# AXLiveAudioGraph

**Class**

An object that represents an audio graph for a live-updating, continuous data series for VoiceOver.

## Declaration

```swift
class AXLiveAudioGraph
```

## Overview

Use [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXLiveAudioGraph] to interact with an ongoing, continuous stream of data that updates with new data in real time.

## Controlling playback

- **start()**: Begins the live audio graph session.
- **stop()**: Ends the live audio graph session.

## Configuring pitch

- **updateValue(_:)**: Sets the pitch of the audio graph’s tone.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
